title: Is My Penis Too Small? – Love & Sex Stuff
description:
Submit your questions here!:
http://www.kindafunny.com/loveandsex


Does size matter? This week Tim and Nick dive into the biggest little problem.

Each and every Monday at 9AM PST Tim Gettys and Nick Scarpino answer your questions about dating and relationship advice....cause that sounds like a good idea.


Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino



Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
